title: PMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 169 Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 169 Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil Engineering, can apply for the PMC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee,...
